sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2011/ L.20), the SBSTA agrees that the definition of forest in exhaustion, as contained in FCCC/KP/CMP/2009/16 Annex I, requires further clarification, and further agrees to continue consideration of the issue at SBSTA 36.

Annual report on the technical review of greenhouse gas inventories and other information reported by parties included in Annex I to the Convention that are also parties to the Kyoto Protocol : This issue (FCCC/SBSTA/2011/INF.16) was first taken up in SBSTA plenary on 29 November.
On 3 December, SBSTA took note of the report.
